description: a(0) = 0; for n > 1, if a(n-1) has appeared three or more times then a(n) = total number of terms between the last and second-last appearance of a(n-1), minus the total number of terms between the second-last and third-last appearance of a(n-1). If a(n-1) has appeared two times, a(n) = total number of terms between the last and second-last appearance of a(n-1). If a(n-1) has appeared once, a(n) = 0.
